title: Google\Apps\Script\Type\Gmail\ContextualTrigger
name: ContextualTrigger
description:
Defines a trigger that fires when the open email meets a specific criteria.

When the trigger fires, it executes a specific endpoint, usually in order to create new cards and update the UI.

Generated from protobuf message google.apps.script.type.gmail.ContextualTrigger

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message
